TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ItemEvents_10_ReplyEventHandler(object Response, out bool Cancel);
.class public auto ansi sealed ItemEvents_10_ReplyEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub ItemEvents_10_ReplyEventHandler(Response As Object, ByRef Cancel As Boolean)
public delegate void ItemEvents_10_ReplyEventHandler(System::Object ^ Response, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] bool % Cancel);

Docs.param: O novo item que está sendo enviado em resposta à mensagem original.
False quando o evento ocorre. Se o procedimento de evento define este argumento como True, a operação de resposta não será concluída e o novo item não será exibido.
Docs.summary: This is a delegate for an event in the corresponding object. After implementing a callback method for the event, use this delegate to connect the callback method to the event. If there are multiple versions of the event interface, this delegate connects the callback method for the event in the specified version of Outlook.
